name: The Million Dollar Quiz 2 | Mixed | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which of these girls' names is also a herb?
The face of which actor appears on his own brand of salad dressing?
Which green vegetable is associated with Popeye?
What would you do with a truffle?
Who produced the official report on the Clinton and Lewinsky affair?
What colour belt do you buy for your outfit when beginning judo classes?
Who first made the liqueur Benedictine?
In Greek legend, who was sent to fetch the 'Golden Fleece'?
What colour is the ELEVEN on a 7-ELEVEN store sign?
What was the first name of the man who invented the Rubik's Cube?
In 1913, which skyscraper was considered to be the tallest building in the world?
Which trained professional uses a theodolite in the course of his or her work?
What is the offspring of a lion and a tigress called?
Which Gospel writer is the patron saint of Venice?
Which cartoon character made his screen debut in 1935?
